name: Pulso (for two)
description:
Pulso is a freeware game that will test your reflexes and those of your friends!

How to play:

  1. Each player grabs the phone from one end of the device and press the ready button
  2. Focus on the circles that are moving randomly and wait for the attack to charge
  3. Press to attack when your circle is aligned with your oponent. The fastest wins!

Make it more fun by using the game to decide who pays for dinner :D
This game is 100% freeware. Does not contain in-app purchases or advertisements. Enjoy :)

Created by Miguel Santirso - http://tir.so
